title: Leave busters!
body:
Thank you for the five 20 minute low priority queue games because of YOUR client crashing and giving me bug splats. Thank you so much riot :) 
When your trying to play ranked who you gunna call?
L E A V E B U S T E R S

replies.body:
I assume you're wanting help regarding your client crashing. So let's see if I'm able to help. First, I'd suggest reviewing [ this post](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/peVhMJAo-experiencing-a-tech-problem-find-the-common-fixes-here) provided kindly by Elduris. Then, if you are still unable to find a resolution to your issue there, simply going to the launcher, and clicking the gear. Then select "repair". This can take some time, depending of course on your internet speed. 
Good luck!{{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}

This post should definitely help out if you are consistently experiencing crashes!  However, if you are still experiencing bugsplats consistently, make sure to complete all of the steps in our [BugSplat Article](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974).  It has the most common solutions that should stop these crashes completely.

Give me a heads up if you are still seeing issues!
but how u gonna fix the 100 minutes of his life lost getting out of low priority?
